allow_soft_placement.desc: Whether to allow variable soft placement on the device This is needed for multi-gpu runs.

log_frequency.desc: How often to log results to the console.

save_frequency.desc: How often to save summaries to disk.

num_epochs.desc: Number of Data Epochs to do training

worker_name.desc: Name of gpu worker to append to each device ops, scope, etc...

CPU_ID.desc: Which CPU to use in a multi-CPU machine.Default 0

eval_interval_secs.desc: How often to run model evaluation.

run_once.desc: Whether to run evalulation only once.

output_labels.desc: Labels to give the output of the NN.

eval_distort.desc: Whether to perform data distortion during evaluation.

NUM_EXAMPLES_PER_EPOCH.desc: Number of examples in training data.

NUM_CLASSES.desc: Number of classes in training/evaluation data.

IMAGE_DTYPE.desc: precision of images stored in the tfRecords file.

LABEL_DTYPE.desc: precision of label stored in the tfRecords file.

train_distort.desc: Whether to perform data distortion during training.

IMAGE_FP16.desc: Whether to use half-precision format for images.

batch_size.desc: number of images per batch to propagate through the network. Powers of 2 are processed more efficiently.Default 64.

data_dir.desc: path to tfrecords file with images + labels.

checkpt_dir.desc: path where to save directory with training data, visualization, and TensorBoard events.

network_config.desc: path to .json file with neural net architecture.

num_gpus.desc: number of gpus to use during training.Default 1.
